attributes.action: limit MP's pay increase to the lowest offered to the public sector.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In December, backbenchers wrote to the independent body which sets their salary, seeking an eye-watering 66 per cent increase on the current £60,277. They then seek to control inflation through limiting the pay of others. In future, MP's pay increases should be limited to the lowest pay increase offered within the public sector.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
